Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller

Class Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller.Match
public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
class that deals with the information of the current match

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Match()
    Match constructor, initializes the arrayLists and the game map
    Match​(boolean debug)
    For debug only, open the server on a randomized port

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(PlayerManager player, SocketThread socket)
    Add a player to the players list
    void addSocket​(SocketThread socket)
    Add a socket to the sockets list and register the observers related to the socket and client connection
    void divinityCreation​(SocketThread socket, java.lang.String divinity)
    Create the divinity of the player that decided which divinity to use If there are no more players that have to choose the divinity start the match If there are other players, ask the next to choose the divinity
    void endMatch()  
    PlayerManager getCurrentPlayer()
    Get the current playing player
    SocketThread getCurrentSocket()  
    GameMap getGameMap()
    Returns the game map
    MatchStatus getMatchStatus()
    Return the state of the match, there are some pre-defined states as enum in MatchStatus class
    java.util.ArrayList<PlayerManager> getPlayerManagers()
    Return the list of the player managers into the match
    java.util.ArrayList<SocketThread> getSockets()
    Return the list of the sockets paired to the connected clients into the match
    TurnManager getTurnManager()
    Get the turn manager reference
    void readyManagement​(SocketThread socket)
    Wait for all the players to be ready and then start the divinity selection phase
    void setCurrentPlayer​(PlayerManager currentPlayer)
    Set the new current player at the turn change
    void setMatchStatus​(MatchStatus matchStatus)
    Set the state of the match in pre-defined states as described in MatchStatus class
    void workerPlacement​(SocketThread socket, WorkerReceiver workers)
    method that recieve the worker placed form the player in the client and place them in actual gameMap in the server

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getGameMap

      public GameMap getGameMap()
      Returns the game map

      Returns:

    • getMatchStatus

      public MatchStatus getMatchStatus()
      Return the state of the match, there are some pre-defined states as enum in MatchStatus class
      Returns:
      the match state

    • setMatchStatus

      public void setMatchStatus​(MatchStatus matchStatus)
      Set the state of the match in pre-defined states as described in MatchStatus class
      Parameters:
      matchStatus - the new state of the match

      Parameters:

      socket - the socket reference

    • addSocket

      public void addSocket​(SocketThread socket)
      Add a socket to the sockets list and register the observers related to the socket and client connection
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket reference

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public PlayerManager getCurrentPlayer()
      Get the current playing player
      Returns:
      che current player playing the turn

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer​(PlayerManager currentPlayer)
      Set the new current player at the turn change
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the new currently playing player

    • getTurnManager

      public TurnManager getTurnManager()
      Get the turn manager reference
      Returns:
      the turn manager reference

    • readyManagement

      public void readyManagement​(SocketThread socket)
      Wait for all the players to be ready and then start the divinity selection phase
      Parameters:
      socket - the reference to the socket

    • divinityCreation

      public void divinityCreation​(SocketThread socket, java.lang.String divinity)
      Create the divinity of the player that decided which divinity to use If there are no more players that have to choose the divinity start the match If there are other players, ask the next to choose the divinity
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket reference, used to get the correct player
      divinity - string that represent the divinity to be created

    • workerPlacement

      public void workerPlacement​(SocketThread socket, WorkerReceiver workers)
      method that recieve the worker placed form the player in the client and place them in actual gameMap in the server
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket we receive message from
      workers - the worker the player has placed

      public SocketThread getCurrentSocket()
